categories: Tools & Brushes, Hair Tools, Hair Straighteners & Flat Irons
about: What it is: An award-winning, two-inch-wide plate flat iron for quicker, easier styling on long, curly, and thick hair...Hair Type: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Texture: Medium and Thick..Hair Concerns:.- Frizz.- Shine.- Straightening and Smoothing..Key Benefits:.- Style long, thick, and curly hair in half the time.- Pre-set to the optimum styling temperature of 365 degrees Fahrenheit for styling with no extreme heat.- Versatile styling to create everything from loose waves to a flawless straight look..What Else You Need to Know: Discover this ghd Max Styler with 70 percent larger plates, ideal for styling long, thick, and curly hair in half the time. Harnessing two new-generation heat sensors to ensure the optimum styling temperature of 365 degrees Fahrenheit for 80 percent more shine and up to two times less frizz, for a long-lasting, salon-quality finish...Clinical Results: In a test comparing the Max Styler with the ghd Original Styler, results showed:.- 70% larger plates..In a technical test in a lab on brunette hair, measured results versus naturally dried hair showed:.-80% more shine..In a technical test in a lab on frizzy hair, comparing hair dried with the Max Styler versus naturally dried hair, results showed:.- Two times less frizz
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use on dry hair..-Section hair into two-inch sections..-Ensure that the styler is as close to the root as possible before closing the plates..-Gently move toward the tip of the section in one simple gliding motion..-Repeat the process with each section of hair, gliding once from roots to ends.

reviews.review_text: I recently had the chance to try out the ghd Max Styler - 2 Wide Plate Flat Iron, provided as a sample in exchange for an honest review. I'm thrilled to share that my experience with this product was nothing short of exceptional! As someone who's been loyal to a 1-inch Chi straightener for years, I was skeptical about trying a new flat iron, but the ghd Max Styler completely changed that.  From the moment I picked up the Max Styler, I was struck by how lightweight and efficient it is. While I had concerns about using 2-inch plates instead of my usual 1-inch, those worries quickly faded. The iron's larger plates didn't compromise comfort or ease of use in the slightest. In fact, I found that it sped up my hairstyling routine considerably and cut my styling time in half!  My hair, which tends to be curly and coarse, usually demands multiple passes to achieve the desired straightness or curls. However, this iron swiftly straightened and even created beautiful beach waves with ease. I was particularly delighted to find that my beach waves turned out stunningly well with the 2-inch plates.  One of the most remarkable outcomes was how my hair appeared post-styling. Despite my hair being bleached, dry, and prone to frizz, I was amazed by the immediate transformation. The iron not only straightened and styled my hair but also left it looking incredibly shiny and healthy with no need for excessive styling products. Longevity is another area where this flat iron truly shines. The results remained stunning even on the following days, adding to the overall value of the product.  If I had to identify a downside, it would be the lack of adjustable temperature settings. The flat iron is limited to an 'on' or 'off' mode, but considering it reaches a maximum temperature of 375*F, this didn't present an issue for me. Less heat is always a better choice for hair health!
